external_games.name: Heroes & Generals - US Soldier Pack: Medium Tanker

name: Heroes & Generals: US Soldier Pack - Medium Tanker
summary: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Medium Tank arsenal, these 4 mean warmachines are ready to challenge heavy armored targets, take on any medium armor, destroy light armor and put a stop to infantry. This pack is perfect for the Tanker who is looking for a powerful approach.
